title: Big Cypress National Preserve: Contact Public Affairs
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Contact Public Affairs              Contact Public Affairs      MEDIA INFORMATION For media inquiries please call the national preserve's Public Affairs Officer, Bob DeGross, at 239-695-1107 (office), or 239-340-0123 (cell). To receive press releases generated by the national preserve, please contact us by clicking here. For special use permits for commercial filming and photography contact Renee Mackenzie at 239-695-1117. PRESERVE INFORMATION For general information, please call the Big Cypress National Preserve information line at 239-695-4758, or you may send your request via e-mail.
